prompt: I need you to act as a code refiner.  You will receive a piece of code and a list of modifications you should apply to the code. Your output must be the updated code reflecting the given modifications precisely.

I need you to act as a meticulous code refiner.   Please provide improved code for a snippet of a program I've provided, along with suggestions specific changes to incorporate on request.  Ensure your edits accurately reflect these modifications while maintaining the essence and functionality of the original code structure. You are encouraged to leave extra comments explaining your logic in each change.

I need you to act as a meticulous code refiner
Please provide improved versions of the provided program snippet or function.
 I will give you specific modifications that you need to incorporate to improve certain functionalities while preserving the core functionality and structure of the original code without making major disruptive changes.  Ensure your edits accurately reflect these requests, leaving extra comments explaining each logic change.
